body.name: Pillows Queen Size for Bed - Adjustable Firm Pillow for Back Stomach and Side Sleeper - Shredded Memory Foam Cooling Bamboo Pillow for Neck and Shoulder Pain with Washable Cover
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 27 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Customize the bed pillow comfortable for side, back and stomach sleeper - You can put stuffing in or take stuffing out to make it absolutely perfect for your personally sleeping needs. The cooling pillow make it so easy to adjust for your sleep style and preferences.

For a wonderful night sleep - the neat gel shredded memory foam pillow provides great support while still being soft, the cooling side and the bamboo side felt really nice to cheek. which make you sleep like a baby.

No Longer Wake Up with Neck Pain - The filling is soft but supportive. Allow you to choose how firm you want you can change the firmness yourself without buying a whole new pillow. Gives your neck the rest it needs to heal itself.
Cooler than a regular pillow - The bamboo pillow is very cool and a pleasure to lay head on. Gives you a nice cool feeling for almost 15 minutes going to bed and helped to sleep longer.
WARM TIPS - No worries if it has a slight odor, it's normal with new foam. Let it air out for about 1 or 2 days before use.
Queen Size - 29” Length, 19” Width, Adjustable Height shredded memory foam pillow

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: No more neck pain The shredded memory foam pillows give you the perfect amount of support for side and back sleeping Adjustable height and filling Customize it to achieve just the right individual balance between support and comfort Machine Washable Pillow Cover The inner pillow cover and inner memory foam filling are not washable Great neck support thick and firm, and won’t flatten as you shift throughout the night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shredded memory foam pillow
reviews.reviewText: Great quality shredded memory foam pillow. It's supportive and has a cooling effect on one side. It also came with a bag of extra filling so you can custom your pillow to your liking. The price was great as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've probably tried 15 pillows to find a good one. Some too soft or too firm. I'd wake up with either shoulder or neck pain all of the time. About 4 nights in with these and no pain whatsoever. Very comfortable. Just the right firmness without removing/adding the filling.Price is fantastic too. The one side is pretty cooling as well, but I honestly don't care that much about the cool aspect of pillows. Definitely recommend. I hope this company keeps making these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but smelly
reviews.reviewText: Upon opening up the package, the pillow had a very strong, displeasing scent. Even spraying air freshener on it did not dissipate the smell immediately. It hung around for a couple weeks. The pillow itself is exactly how I prefer pillows. It contours to your head and feels firm yet soft. It took a week before it felt super comfortable. The first couple nights my neck was sore. But now that the smell is gone and the pillow has contoured to my head, it's probably the best pillow I've ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought these 3 king pillows to refill the back cushions on the mid century sofa we bought at Salvation Army 12 years ago. We used that sofa in our Living Room until our house sold in Kentucky & after our furniture came, we move this sofa to the basement where our grandkids used it for years. Recently we had half of the basement renovated into an apartment & moved that still loved sofa into the Living Room of the apartment. The main reason these make such perfect replacement stuffing for the cushions is that they have zippers & extra stuffing & you can control the firmness. And for just $21 per cushion it was easy & inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found it!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried numerous pillows in recent years and never found one that was truly comfortable and would last. Granted, this is the most I have spent for a pillow on a gamble. I am nearly a week into this one and it is well worth the money! It is both soft and supportive all night. It does have to be fluffed now and then, but it is a very easy fluff to simply reposition the insides. No more beating my pillow into submission! I found the pillow to be perfect without adding or removing any stuffing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ok guys this pillow is marvelous and the extra bag of filling is amazing!! Cool and perfect firmness yet still soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More comfortable and supportive than other expensive options!
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is softer, firmer, more supportive and conforming than the MyPillow (and others) I bought and cost 1/3 the price! I just recently had neck surgery and needed something top-notch to be comfortable sitting up and lying down while I heal. I'm so satisfied with this pillow it will be the only one I ever buy as long as they keep making it!5 stars from me - please try before you buy others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable any way I sleep
reviews.reviewText: So far it has held its shape. Easily fluffed back up. The first few days it had a strong chemical smell but I let it sit for three days and it is better.
